servinfo.title: Rear Oil Seal and Flywheel Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Main Bearings, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Removal and Installation

servinfosub.title: Rear Oil Seal
servinfosub.ptxt: Carefully inspect oil seal for wear or damage. If lip portion is worn or damaged, replace oil seal.

item.ptxt: If ring gear is damaged, cracked or worn, replace flywheel.
If the surface contacting clutch disc is damaged or excessively worn, replace flywheel.
Check flywheel for face runout with a dial gauge. If runout exceeds its limit, replace flywheel.
